name: ZS Social Chat by ZS Software Studio
author: ZS Software Studio

sections.description:
ZS Social Chat will help you to add WhatsApp Chat Button in your website so that your users can connect with you through WhatsApp & WhatsApp Business. You can say the button as a Standalone WhatsApp Button. Because we only support WhatsApp button so that you can achieve just one thing with one plugin. You have to just add your Phone Number and the Position you want to set for Button. Plus a message visitor can ask you for first time chat.

Plugin Documentation: https://wordpress.org/plugins/zs-social-chat/

  • Need Help?
  • About ZS Software Studio

Settings you can Change

  • No setup needed.
  • Phone Number.
  • Position of the Button.

You can make my day by submitting a positive review on WordPress.org!

Features

  • Very easy to install
  • Flexible and easy to use
sections.installation:
1. Upload zs-social-chat to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Do I need to setup anything?

Just add your Phone Number & A Message.
